task.title: How to enable prebuilt rules
task.shortdesc: Here you will get instructions about how to enable prebuilt rules.

taskbody.prereq:
To successfully enable prebuilt rules:
You must be logged into the application.
Have permissions to enable or modify automations for your workspace or project.

step.cmd: Choose a rule (e.g., notify on overdue task).

example.p: Rule: “Notify assignee when task is overdue.”
If assignee forgets a task, he or she gets an email and Slack ping automatically.
